global.ability_ready: ${ability} is back in season. Use it before it goes out of style.
global.capped_job_points: Your Job Points are maxed out! Now if only your fashion sense were.
global.capped_merit_points: Maxed out on Merit Points. Now that's how you level with style.
global.flavor_text: <1>A look without layers? Don't even joke.</1> <2>If your gear isn't fabulous, why even fight?</2> <3>Confidence is the best stat. Stack it generously.</3> <4>Style over strength? I say - why not both!</4> <5>Some call it over-accessorizing. I call it preparedness.</5> <6>Armor is just fashion with defense, sweetie.</6> <7>Clashing colors? That's a crime in all nations.</7> <8>That body piece needs a belt and a blessing.</8> <9>I just saw someone in mismatched greaves. Oh, I feel faint.</9> <10>Wearing white in Valkurm? Bold. I admire the drama.</10> <11>They say 'less is more' - but I say 'more is magnificent!'</11> <12>Going out in that lockstyle? You're braver than I thought.</12> <13>I don't care if it's Haste +5. If it's hideous, it's a no.</13> <14>Nothing says 'I'm ready for battle' like coordinated dyes.</14> <15>They called it glamorless. I called it 'pre-patch chic.'</15> <16>Why yes, this is limited-time eventwear. Thank you for noticing.</16> <17>Your enmity won't rise if your fashion doesn't shine!</17> <18>If I had a gil for every unfashionable adventurer I saw... I'd buy Jeuno.</18> <19>That subligar is a choice. Not a good one, but a choice.</19> <20>Helms are so last season. Let the hair flow!</20> <21>Enfeebling magic? More like unfashionable magic if you're wearing that.</21> <22>You say artifact armor. I say artful armor.</22> <23>The true endgame? Lockstyles, of course. You must look flawless at all times.</23> <24>Your gear may be Rare/Ex, but is it Rare/Exquisite?</24> <25>Nothing enhances evasion like elegant posture.</25> <26>Fighting undead in that drab outfit? Now THAT is horror!</26> <27>Even my macros are color-coordinated, sweetie.</27> <28>If you're not glamming while spamming, you're doing it wrong.</28> <29>That tabard? So Conquest Week 3. Please evolve.</29> <30>Oh, I do dye my armor to match the moon phase.</30> <31>Fashion faux pas? Honey, this is a battlefield.</31> <32>You can't spell 'haute couture' without 'hurt' - and that's what you'll feel if you wear that cape again.</32> <33>Who put together your outfit? A blind Goblin?</33> <34>Your DPS is decent, but your DRS - Dramatic Runway Stride - needs work.</34> <35>Your boots are screaming... and not in a good way.</35> <36>I once fought an Aern wearing that body piece. It died of embarrassment.</36> <37>You know what else is heavy besides that armor? My disappointment.</37> <38>Your fashion is so outdated, it came pre-patched.</38> <39>That set may give +10 to stats, but -50 to chic.</39> <40>I don't care how amazing the stats are - that belt is not making the cut.</40> <41>You've got full haste... but zero taste.</41> <42>If I see another adventurer in crab armor, I'll molt from secondhand shame.</42> <43>You're built like a tank... but dressed like a bank robbery.</43> <44>That color combination is more cursed than Dynamis-Xarcabard.</44> <45>Slay your foes, yes - but slay the runway first.</45> <46>I cast Protectra V - from your wardrobe choices!</46> <47>Even my shadows have better coordination than that lockstyle.</47> <48>I could forgive the weapon delay... but those shoulder pads? Never.</48> <49>What's more terrifying than Kirin? That ensemble.</49> <50>This isn't just a battlefield - it's a catwalk of destiny.</50> <51>Your linkshell called. They want their dignity back.</51> <52>That cape is so last expansion. Please upgrade.</52> <53>If you're going to fight for your life, at least look fabulous doing it!</53>
global.food_wears_off: Your food buff expired... much like those outdated boots.

info.introduction: I am Brygid, stylist extraordinaire, savior of silhouettes and slayer of style faux pas!
info.name: Brygid
